```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

charts.data <- read.csv("copper-data-for-tutorial.csv")

# View the updated dataset
head(charts.data)
```

```{r}
head(area_vs_height_data)
```

```{r}
# with fill component
p2 <- ggplot() + geom_area(aes(y = export, x = year, fill=product), data = charts.data,
                           stat="identity")
p2
```

```{r}
# without fill component
p2 <- ggplot() + geom_area(aes(y = export, x = year), data = charts.data,
                           stat="identity")
p2
```


## Area vs Height Dataset

```{r}

area_vs_height_data <- read.csv("height_vs_area_data_for_city_Aalborg.csv")

p <- ggplot(area_vs_height_data) + 
    geom_area(aes(y = area, x = height)) +
    theme_minimal()
  
print(p)

```
